text: Hagi Aroni nagapinti pristi vahe'mofoma fugo krima re'nesigeno'o, agoza krima eri'nesigeno avo'ma enevania vahe'mo'a, Israeli vahe'mo'za ofama emema hanaza ne'zana oneno mani'neno agrua hugahie. Hagi magomo'ma fri'nenia zagama avako hanigeno azeri pehanama haniano, mase'nenigeno avufga rima evuge haniano,
